code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate,Link as RouterLink}from'react-router-dom';import{Container,Paper,TextField,Button,Typography,Link,Box,Alert,Avatar}from'@mui/material';import{PersonAdd as PersonAddIcon}from'@mui/icons-material';import{useAuth}from'../../context/AuthContext';import'./Auth.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');if(formData.password!==formData.confirmPassword){setError('Passwords do not match');return;}setLoading(true);try{const result=await register(formData.name,formData.email,formData.password);if(result.success){navigate('/chat');}else{setError(result.error);}}catch(err){setError('An error occurred during
